analysis.key_quote: I urge OPM to withdraw the proposed Schedule Policy/Career rule because it is unlawful for the following reasons: ... Eliminating Chapters 43/75 and MSPB appeal rights leaves them without any meaningful pre- or post-termination hearing, breaching the Fifth Amendment.
analysis.rationale: The comment opposes the proposed rule by highlighting its legal and constitutional issues, emphasizing the importance of existing civil service protections and due process rights, which aligns with a stance against the politicization of civil service.
